# Tender Notice

* **Job Title (EN)**: RFP 407: Stream 3A, Financial Instruments Valuation – Public Sector Pension Investment Board
* **Job Title (FR)**: DDP 407 : Volet 3A, Évaluation d’instruments financiers – Office d’investissement des régimes de pensions du secteur public 
* **Reference Number (EN)**: cb-845-29804204
* **Amendment Number (EN)**: 1
* **Solicitation Number (EN)**: 407
* **Publication Date**: 2023-12-11
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-01-05T14:00:00 (Expiring)
* **Amendment Date**: 2024-01-05
* **Contract Duration**: Initial period of 12 months (2024-01-06 to 2024-06-30) with two (2) optional extensions of 12 months
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Audit Services)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Selective Tendering
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest combined rating for Technical Merit and Price
* **Regions of Opportunity**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada
* **Contracting Entity**: Office of the Auditor General of Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 240 Sparks Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0G6, Canada
* **Contact Information**: Beth Cooper, suppliers@oag-bvg.gc.ca, (613) 952-0213

## Tender Description

This RFP is open only to suppliers who hold a successful Audit and Related Services Supply Arrangement (SA) qualification under Stream 3A – Financial Instrument Valuation.

The Public Sector Pension Investment Board (PSPIB) requires an auditor to perform annual audit services for the financial statements ending 2024, with options to extend for the years ending 2025 and 2026. The auditor will assist the Office of the Auditor General (OAG) in the valuation of financial instruments, including derivatives and private debt securities.

## Application Information

Qualified bidders are invited to submit a proposal in accordance with the requirements outlined in the RFP. 

Only suppliers who have been pre-qualified to the SA369 series of SAs will be considered for this opportunity.
